product_name: Club Ride Laurel Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Surprise your friends with the attractive style of the women's Club Ride Laurel Bike Jersey. It's loaded with technical features, yet looks restaurant ready. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Side burnout accent fabric aids venting. Hidden front zipper also enhances airflow. Zippered rear pocket sports a media port for off-bike listening. Club Ride Laurel Bike Jersey features reflective accents for increased visibility in low light.
short_description: Surprise your friends with the attractive style of the women's Club Ride Laurel Bike Jersey. It's loaded with technical features, yet looks restaurant ready.
